mapper.select: SELECT `mo_num` AS `moNum`, `mo_title` AS `moTitle`, `mo_date` AS `moDate`, `mo_time` AS `moTime`, `mo_plot` AS `moPlot`, `mo_booking_rate` AS `moBookingRate`, `mo_ending` AS `moEnding`, `ra_num` AS `raNum` FROM `jgv`.`movie` WHERE `mo_title` = #{moTitle}

SELECT `ci_num` AS `ciNum`, `ci_name` AS `ciName`, `cinema`.`th_num` AS `thNum`, `cit_num` AS `citNum` FROM `jgv`.`cinema` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`theater` t ON `cinema`.th_num = t.th_num WHERE `ci_name` = #{ciName} AND `th_name` = #{thName}

SELECT `ci_num` AS `ciNum`, `ci_name` AS `ciName`, `cinema`.`th_num` AS `thNum`, `cinema`.`cit_num` AS `citNum` FROM `jgv`.`cinema` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`theater` t ON `cinema`.`th_num` = t.th_num LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`cinema_type` ct on `cinema`.cit_num = ct.cit_num WHERE `cit_name` = #{citName} AND `th_name` = #{thName}

SELECT `mo_num` AS `moNum`, `mo_title` AS `moTitle`, `mo_date` AS `moDate`, `mo_time` AS `moTime`, `mo_plot` AS `moPlot`, `mo_booking_rate` AS `moBookingRate`, `mo_ending` AS `moEnding`, `movie`.`ra_num` AS `raNum`, `ra_grade` AS `raGrade` FROM `jgv`.`movie` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`rating` ra ON movie.ra_num = ra.ra_num ORDER BY `mo_booking_rate` DESC

SELECT `mo_num` AS `moNum`, `mo_title` AS `moTitle`, `mo_date` AS `moDate`, `mo_time` AS `moTime`, `mo_plot` AS `moPlot`, `mo_booking_rate` AS `moBookingRate`, `mo_ending` AS `moEnding`, `movie`.`ra_num` AS `raNum`, `ra_grade` AS `raGrade` FROM `jgv`.`movie` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`rating` ra ON movie.ra_num = ra.ra_num ORDER BY `mo_title`
SELECT `reg_num` AS `regNum`, `reg_name` AS `regName`, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM `jgv`.`theater` WHERE `region`.`reg_num` = `theater`.`reg_num`) AS `theaterCount` FROM `jgv`.`region`
SELECT `sc_num` AS `scNum`, `sc_start_date` AS `scStartDate`, `mo_num` AS `moNum`, `ci_num` AS `ciNum` FROM `jgv`.`screen`

SELECT movie.`mo_num` AS `moNum`, `mo_title` AS `moTitle`, `mo_date` AS `moDate`, `mo_time` AS `moTime`, `mo_plot` AS `moPlot`, `mo_booking_rate` AS `moBookingRate`, `mo_ending` AS `moEnding`, `m_img_url` AS `mImgUrl` FROM `jgv`.`movie` LEFT JOIN `jgv`.`movie_image` Img ON movie.mo_num = Img.mo_num WHERE `mo_title` = #{moTitle}
